description: The idea is great! Not only teaches how to use a keyboard, it helps hand-brain coordination and also helps in learning and writing simple syllables. But the sound files should be improved. Some are highier other can hardly be heard... not good for little children's attention! Could be improved by recording sounds again or give users the ability to input our own sounds (via GUI): that would also be great!
summary: Great idea with room for improvement
